publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4431 Ms Sandra White: Independence for Montenegro—That the Parliament sends its warmest congratulations to the people of Montenegro for voting to secede from Serbia and recognises that independence is the most normal state of affairs in every corner of our world.
S2M-4431 Independence for Montenegro (lodged on 22 May 2006) Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Campbell Martin*, Jim Mather*, Brian Adam*, Eleanor Scott*, Christine Grahame*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4431 Independence for Montenegro (lodged on 22 May 2006) Rob Gibson*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Michael Matheson*

S2M-4431 Ms Sandra White: Independence for Montenegro—That the Parliament sends its warmest congratulations to the people of Montenegro for voting to secede from Serbia and recognises that independence is the most normal state of affairs in every corner of our world. Supported by: Mr Stewart Maxwell, Campbell Martin, Jim Mather, Brian Adam, Eleanor Scott, Christine Grahame, Roseanna Cunningham, Mr Adam Ingram, Rob Gibson, Ms Maureen Watt, Michael Matheson, Stewart Stevenson*
S2M-4431 Independence for Montenegro (lodged on 22 May 2006) Linda Fabiani*, Richard Lochhead*, Dr Jean Turner*, Fiona Hyslop*
